    Chapman University's Leadership



Chapman's administration and board of trustees embody the spirit and goals of the university through their leadership in fields that span Chapman's wide-ranging curriculum. Whether in the classroom or out in the community, their innovation and excellence provides inspiration for Chapman's upcoming generation of scholars and leaders.









      Board of Trustees
  










      Daniele C. Struppa, Ph.D.
  


        President

      









      Norma Bouchard, Ph.D.

  


        Executive Vice President, Provost and Chief Academic Officer
      









      Harold W. Hewitt Jr.
  


        Executive Vice President 
and Chief Operating Officer
      









      Matt Parlow
  


        Executive Vice President 
and Chief Advancement Officer
      









      Brian K. Powell, JD
  


        Vice President 
and Chief Human Resources Officer 
      









      Collette Creppell
  


        Vice President of Campus Planning and Design
      









      Helen Norris 
  


        Vice President 
and Chief Information Officer
      









      Jamie Ceman
  


        Vice President of Strategic Marketing and Communications
      









      Martina Nieswandt, Ph.D. 
  


        Vice President of Research
      









      Janna Bersi, Ed.D.
  


        Vice President of Investments and Administration
      









      Jerry Price, Ph.D.
  


        Vice President for Student Affairs and Dean of Students
      









      Joseph M. Slowensky
  


        Vice President of Institutional Effectiveness and Faculty Advancement
      









      Mike Pelly
  


        Vice President and Dean of Enrollment
      









      Reg Chhen Stewart, Ph.D.
  


        Vice President of Diversity, Equity and Inclusion
      









      Amy Rogan-Mehta
  


        Vice President of University Advancement
